summary.en-US: This module lets you choose between ChatHead and Bubble in Facebook Messenger

description.en-US:
Changelog

  • Minor bug fixes

By default, this module enables the chat head feature.
In order to change it to bubble,
-> Open Messenger app and go to its setting page.
-> Click on the toggle icon from the top-right corner.
-> Choose bubble option from the pop-up dialog.
[If you want to hide the toggle icon, long press on it and remove.]

[Solution for Android 12 freezing issue] ✔
-> Install Termux app and run this command:

su -c settings put global block_untrusted_touches 0

[uninstall termux again if you don't need it]
Source code: https://github.com/NeonOrbit/ChatHeadEnabler

summary.en-US: MACsposed - Add support for MAC Address spoofing to Android 12 through 14!

description.en-US:
MACsposed 1.2.2 adds an Arabic translation provided by @mast3rz3ro.

Changelog for MACsposed 1.2.0:

MACsposed 1.2.0 is here! This major update introduces integrated support for MAC address spoofing which eliminates the need to rely on third party spoofing applications. Although third party spoofing tools are no longer required, they are still supported if you wish to continue using them.

Other changes introduced with this release include:

  • A built-in user interface with support for Material You theming and dark mode.
  • A redesigned app icon for consistency with the new UI's design language.
  • Support for changing how the app behaves when enabling the MAC address override.
  • Support for restoring a spoofed MAC address on boot.
  • Support for disabling logging of attempts by Android to change the MAC address in the LSPosed Manager.
  • A Hindi translation of the user interface provided by @99keshav99.

With this release, MACsposed is shifting to a paid licensing model and requires an in-app purchase of a subscription or a lifetime license to unlock its functionality.

summary.en-US: All-in-one complex module for devices running vanilla Android 8 Oreo

description.en-US:
• Added compatibility with EdXposed v0.5+ and LSPosed
  • Added support for LSPosed module scope feature (auto-whitelist)
  • Maintains backwards compatibility with EdXposed v0.4 and OG Xposed Framework
    --- moving from old OG Xposed Framework to EdXposed/LSPosed is now strongly recommended, though!
  • Does not require Xposed Resource Hooking support to be enabled anymore!
  • Resource replacement:
    --- redesigned for better compatibility and performance
    --- implemented support for aliased resources pointing to Framework resources
    --- Added support for resource overlays:
    ------ improves Advanced Tuning compatibility with systems using Theme overlays
    ------ fixes "Remove corner padding" option on Nokia (and other) devices
    ------ fixes hiding navigation bar by disabling "Enable navigation bar" option in Navbar tweaks
  • StatusbarClock: respect time zone changes when showing seconds
  • StatusbarClock: keep master switch for Clock tweaks off by default (thanks to aviraxp)
  • Media: improved compatibility of More music volume steps feature
  • Keys: improved reliability of Torch on power long-press
  • ImagePicker: use dedicated library for cropping images instead of unreliable camera CROP intent
  • About: added references to EdXposed and Riru
  • Fixed XSharedPreferences Unexpected EOF errors showing in Xposed log
  • Fixed layout/scaling of all GravityBox view elements affected by DPI change when screen resolution changes

IMPORTANT: Module settings are reset when framework is upgraded from EdXposed v0.4/OG Xposed to EdXposed v0.5.1+/LSPosed
due to changes in preferences storage location for modules in EdXposed v0.5/LSPosed
It is recommended to create a backup of GravityBox settings before upgrading the framework.

summary.en-US:
固定应用，类似于IOS的引导式访问。
Pinning App, Guided access similar to IOS

description.en-US:
PinningApp v1.0

中文

  • 固定应用模块首发！

  • 模块效果：
  • 当进入固定模式时，手机将只显示被固定App的界面，系统返回等手势将失效。
  • 类似IOS的引导式访问功能

  • 模块功能：

  • 手机：
  • 固定应用、拒绝返回手势、拒绝呼出侧边栏（可选）、解除固定时锁屏（可选）等。
  • Pad：
  • 固定应用、拒绝返回手势、拒绝呼出侧边栏（可选）、解除固定时锁屏（可选）、
  • 拒绝呼出Dock栏、拒绝响应小窗手势、隐藏小白条 等。

  • 详细请参考README.md

English

  • First Release of the Pinning App Module!

  • Module Effects:
  • When entering pinning mode, the phone will only display the interface of the pinning app, and system gestures such as back will be disabled.
  • Similar to IOS's guided access feature.

  • Module Features:

  • For Phones:
  • Pinning App, reject back gestures, reject pop-up sidebar (optional), lock screen on exit (optional), etc.
  • For Pads:
  • Pinning App, reject back gestures, reject pop-up sidebar (optional), lock screen on exit (optional),
  • Reject call-out of Dock bar, reject response to small window gestures, hide the small white bar, etc.

  • For details, please refer to README.md.

description.en-US:
Geergit v2.5.2 (20513) Release Notes

  1. Module Status Handling:

    • If a module is not enabled, it will no longer redirect to the "module not working" page. Instead, a warning will be shown at the top while still allowing access to features.

  2. General Improvements and Bug Fixes:

    • Various improvements and bug fixes to enhance overall performance and stability.

  3. Mock Location Spoofing:

    • Improved handling of mock location spoofing for better accuracy and reliability.

  4. Backup Awareness:

    • Users are now informed that victim app data backups are only stored on the device.

  5. Anti-Fingerprinting Switch (Experimental):

    • Added an Anti-Fingerprinting switch with multiple methods to prevent device fingerprinting.

  6. Group and Profile Fixes:

    • Fixed group-related bugs and resolved the "Profile Not Found" issue.

  7. Non-English Support:

    • Geergit now supports non-English devices and apps, fixing previous errors encountered with non-English applications.

description.en-US:
由于业务变更，Cemiuiler将迁移至 HyperCeiler 继续为大家提供服务。
在您迁移至HyperCeiler之前，请注意使用1.3.130版本备份您的存档，或者运行至少一次Cemiuiler的1.3.130版本。
详细迁移方法见 版本迁移

支持版本：

MIUI 12.5(125) / 12.5E(125) / 13.0(130) / 13.1(130) / 13.2(130) / 14.0(140)
Android 11(R, 30) / 12(S, 31) / 12R(S, 32) / 13(T, 33)
请注意，目前暂未适配 HyperOS 1。

更新日志：

  1. 新增 com.sevtinge.hyperceiler.expansionpacks；(@Sevtinge)
  2. 新增 默认存档迁移；(@Sevtinge)
  3. 移除 com.sevtinge.cemiuiler.expansionpack；(@Sevtinge)
  4. 移除 存档加密；(@Sevtinge)
  5. 优化 系统更新-伪装版本 兼容HyperOS版本命名方式；(@mu7220)

注意事项：

  1. 目前暂未适配 Android 14(U, 34)，若您执意在 Android 14 上使用，请将 LSPosed 版本更新至 7017 及以上；
  2. 目前暂未适配 HyperOS 1；
  3. 该版本备份文件加密方式发生变化，请重新备份；
  4. 出现任何问题请关闭禁用详细日志输出后携带日志提交给开发者；
  5. 以下Pull Requests审核待通过：#403。

版本迁移：

由于业务变更，Cemiuiler将迁移至HyperCeiler继续为大家提供服务。
HyperCeiler基础支持范围与Cemiuiler相同，并将在Cemiuiler的基础上兼容HyperOS，您可以放心更新。

迁移方法

  • 迁移方法1：在保证Cemiuiler激活的情况下，打开至少一次Cemiuiler，我们将自动为您将存档迁移至HyperCeiler，您无需提前安装HyperCeiler。
  • 迁移方法2：若上述方法不生效，您可以在Cemiuiler的1.3.130版本中备份您的存档，并在HyperCeiler中导入。
  • 迁移方法3：若上述方法均不生效，请前往/data/misc/<key>/prefs/com.sevtinge.cemiuiler/复制cemiuiler_prefs.xml文件并粘贴至/data/misc/<key>/prefs/com.sevtinge.hyperceiler/下，并将文件名改为hyperceiler_prefs.xml，其中为一串识别码，若存在多个，请以修改日期最近的为准。

判断是否迁移成功

  • 方法1：下载HyperCeiler并激活 (截至更新时间，HyperCeiler仍处于测试阶段，请谨慎安装并激活)，若HyperCeiler中已经存在您之前Cemiuiler的设置，则迁移成功。
  • 方法2：前往/data/misc/<key>/prefs/com.sevtinge.hyperceiler/目录下，若存在hyperceiler_prefs.xml，则迁移成功，其中为一串识别码，若存在多个，请以修改日期最近的为准。

另外，Cemiuiler官网将迁移至 HyperCeiler官网，Cemiuiler官网将于之后重定向至HyperCeiler官网。
Cemiuiler开源地址将于本次更新后存档，并迁移至 HyperCeiler开源地址。
感谢您对Cemiuiler的一路支持。

Copyright © 2023 saraSaku.Hj & Sevtinge

我 心 澎 湃 ！！！

description.en-US:
更新日志

新增

  • 改善的用户界面
  • 模块精简模式（只启用“自定义媒体控件”和“桌面高级模糊效果”两个功能）
  • 强制控制电池指示器的显示模式（忽略系统设置）
  • 高级模糊效果新增文件夹背景模糊
  • 高级模糊效果适配平板桌面
  • 高级模糊效果的动画曲线调整增加曲线预览
  • 锁屏界面的运营商标签位置（左上角）可显示运营商标签或时间

修复

  • 自定义媒体控件的尺寸问题
  • 高级模糊效果的资源错误释放（部分动画曲线下模糊完全失效）
  • 最近任务无法显示真实内存占用
  • 备份与恢复数据类型问题
  • 部分文本错误

其它

  • 已测试手机桌面版本：RELEASE-4.39.15.8280-07041845 (439158280)
  • 已测试平板桌面版本：RELEASE-4.40.0.7202-05162110 (440007202)
  • 目前（手机）桌面版本较多，暂不会适配新版本（如重构版桌面）
  • 由于之前的备份功能有些问题，强烈建议不要使用/恢复之前的备份文件

Changelog

Feature

  • Improved UI
  • Lite mode (Only load core functionality)
  • Modify the style of the battery indicator (ignore system settings)
  • Blur the background when opening a folder [Advanced blur effects]
  • Support for tablets [Advanced blur effects]
  • Improved custom animation curves [Advanced blur effects]
  • Carrier label position on the lock screen can display the carrier label or time

Bugfix

  • Incorrect size of the media control panel [Customize the style of the media control]
  • Blur effect disappears unexpectedly (when using some animated curves) [Advanced blur effects]
  • Unable to show real memory usage in recent tasks [Show real memory usage]
  • Crash after restoring a backup file
  • Some textual errors

Other

  • Recommended version of system launcher (Phone): RELEASE-4.39.15.8280-07041845 (439158280)
  • Recommended version of system launcher (Pad): RELEASE-4.40.0.7202-05162110 (440007202)
  • It is strongly recommended to AVOID using/restoring previous backup files

name.en-US: 自动授权Data目录/Auto auth Data dir

summary.en-US: 通过Hook，当有APP申请访问【Android/data】目录时，自动调用代码授权，省去**两个步骤**

description.en-US:
Auth-one

  • 此版本是申请一个授权一个，取决于目标应用（如【MT管理器】）的申请，作用域仅给【文件】app即可

Auth-all

  • 此版本通过Hook目标应用（如【MT管理器】app），可以一次性授权所有应用（存在个别的应用无法授权）
  • 已经在【MT管理器】app、【雪豹速清】app 测试通过
  • 此版本LSPosed作用域为目标应用（如【MT管理器】app），和【文件】app

Auth-one

  • This version is to apply for one authorization, depending on the application of the target application (such as [MT Manager]), the scope is only for the [File] app

Auth-all

  • This version can authorize all applications at one time through the Hook target application (such as [MT Manager] app) (some applications cannot be authorized)
  • It has passed the test in [MT Manager] app and [雪豹速清] app
  • The scope of this version of LSPosed is the target application (such as [MT Manager] app), and [File] app

ROOT[Recommend]: Root permission is required to write configuration and read records (Log)
Normal: Storage permissions are required to write configurations and read records (Log). Android 13 requires each app to grant permissions individually
Lite: No permission required, only for LSPosed, no extensions, no recording, Android version >8

ROOT【推荐】: 需要root权限进行写入配置，以及读取记录（Log）
Normal: 需要存储权限进行写入配置，以及读取记录（Log），同样适用于LSPatch，安卓13需要每个应用单独授予权限
Lite: 无需任何权限，仅用于LSPosed，无扩展功能，无记录功能，安卓版本 >8

• Поддержка версии 12.21.10
  • Скрытие иконки модуля теперь доступно только в root режиме.

description.en-US:
• Android 13 support (xposed)

Note
This is the last update for this fork. The update contains fixes for xposed crashes on Android 13.
The update does not contain new hooks for modern ways of existing features, so they may not work on some applications.
The application fully uses the original hooks with support for new OS versions. Many applications use new methods added by Google later.

If anyone is interested, you can continue to develop new hooks methods.
